001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.util.EnumSet;
008import java.util.Properties;
009import java.util.Set;
010
011/**
012 * Loads {@link Config} instances from configuration files.
013 * <p>Thread-safe; performs a best-effort parse with sensible defaults.</p>
014 *
015 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
016 */
017public final class ConfigLoader {
018  private ConfigLoader() {}
019
020  /**
021   * Reads optional configuration properties from the given path and builds a {@link Config}.
022   *
023   * @param path properties file path; may be {@code null} or non-existent to use defaults
024   * @return configuration populated with file values overriding defaults
025   * @throws IOException if the file exists but cannot be read
026   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027   */
028  public static Config fromProperties(Path path) throws IOException {
029    Properties props = new Properties();
030    if (path != null && Files.exists(path)) {
031      try (var reader = Files.newBufferedReader(path)) {
032        props.load(reader);
033      }
034    }
035    String iface = props.getProperty("iface", Config.defaults().interfaceName());
036    String bpf = props.getProperty("bpf", Config.defaults().bpf());
037    int snap = Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("snap", String.valueOf(Config.defaults().snapLength())));
038    Set<ProtocolId> enabled = EnumSet.copyOf(Config.defaults().enabledProtocols());
039    String protocols = props.getProperty("protocols");
040    if (protocols != null && !protocols.isBlank()) {
041      enabled.clear();
042      for (String token : protocols.split(",")) {
043        enabled.add(ProtocolId.valueOf(token.trim().toUpperCase()));
044      }
045    }
046    return new Config(iface, bpf, snap, enabled);
047  }
048}
